title: Collaborative Problem-Solving Development Program Using Educational Robotics

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a hybrid BYOD environment, primarily using educational robot simulation tools for linguistic problem-solving.

learning_goals: Participants can design a robotic collaboration system to solve complex language-related problems in a 2-week team-based project
Learners can apply three or more collaborative problem-solving strategies (communication, division of labor, integration) in a VR environment
Teams can achieve an 85%+ success rate in two simulation tasks reflecting real-world educational field problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
